knowledgeGraph.title: Loma Linda University Medical Center
knowledgeGraph.description: Loma Linda University Medical Center is a teaching hospital in California's Inland Empire region. Opened in 1905, it is a level 1 trauma center and is staffed by nearly 900 faculty physicians and over 1,000 beds. The main tower of the center was built in 1967 and is 9 stories high.
